channel.title: Batman Arkham City stuck at Wonder Tower Access!
channel.description: I'm on the the mission to get the master control program from the Tyger helicopter, but once I've found the correct helicopter and downloaded the program, I can't go any further, I took out the two snipers and tried to access the advanced door lock using Batman hacking machine, but everytime I try batman says that he can't access it without finding Tyger master control program! am confused folk I need help

item.title: Batman Arkham City stuck at Wonder Tower Access!
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
the save was bugged, I’ve installed the patch, and it fixed it

Read full topic
item.source: Batman Arkham City stuck at Wonder Tower Access!

item.title: Batman Arkham City stuck at Wonder Tower Access!
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Shadi:

I’m on the the mission to get the master control program from the Tyger helicopter, but once I’ve found the correct helicopter and downloaded the program, I can’t go any further, I took out the two snipers and tried to access the advanced door lock using Batman hacking machine, but everytime I try batman says that he can’t access it without finding Tyger master control program! am confused folk I need help

Try a walkthrough.

Read full topic
item.source: Batman Arkham City stuck at Wonder Tower Access!

item.title: Batman Arkham City stuck at Wonder Tower Access!
item.dc:creator: XenoSpyro
item.description:
Shadi:

and you’re quite new here so I won’t blame ya

What are you talking about? I wasn’t even serious.
I was making fun of you for coming to BLACK MESA forums with a BATMAN problem…
If I was 1000 posts up and been used this place for years I’d still tell you the exact same thing.

Shadi:

the support section

Of Eidos forums. You know. The people that made the game.

Read full topic
